A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was awful. Besides all the unanswered or ignored questions from episode 7\, besides craping all over Luke Skywalker\, besides somehow mixing in a peta PSA\, this was just a bad movie. Awful and ill timed jokes. Ridiculous plot holes (If Luke went there to be alone\, why did he leave a map!?). I might have enjoyed it if it wasn't star wars\, but it was\, so I didn't.
